pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt, long pants, socks and shoes, and chemical resistant gloves made of any waterproof material such as polyethylene or polyvinyl chloride.

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes, skin or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
